text: ProLife Alliance was formed in the UK in October 1996, originally as a political party. It put up 56 candidates at the 1997 general election and also contested the 2004 European elections. __TOC__ ==Election results== ===House of Commons=== {| class="wikitable" |+ House of Commons of the United Kingdom !
